text: To find a Japanese restaurant which serves great quality in a residential estate, I couldn't be happier. Kaijou Japanese Cuisine is a cozy gem, offering thick slices of salmon that make their lunch sets a fantastic value. Definitely worth a visit!

Great service, food not bad reasonable pricing. Wish they have more drink pairing food selection though. And the deco and lighting a little confusing of a mix of an Izayaki and family dinning lol. Nevertheless will be back to chill.

Went in for my father in lawâ€™s birthday celebration. First time here but didnâ€™t disappoint us . The maguro carpaccio is uniquely marinated with truffle must try.
Shabu shabu portioned well and pork was fresh tasty!   Over all good quality food and enjoyable for family and Friends .
Will visit back soon to check out the Bento and lunch sets  ðŸ˜‹
High quality food, generous serving and thick sashimi. Attentive service.    Not your typical neighborhood Japanese restaurant.  Worth the slightly higher price.
